house_listing.house_description: Beautiful Colonial home in a very peaceful section of Virginia Beach. Large fenced-in yard with inground pool. Home just appraised for $265K and is priced below market value for quick sale! Tour the inside of this home and 100s of others at House4U.com
house_listing.firm_name: RE/MAX Central Realty RE/MAX Central Realty

residential_listing_-_feature_details.rooms: Bonus Room, Dining Room, Family Room, Living Room, Master
